import React, { useState } from "react"; import { MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBIcon, MDBInputGroup, MDBRadio, MDBRow, MDBTypography, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; const initialWeatherData = { name: "City", sys: { country: "Country Code" }, main: { temp: 0, feels_like: 0, temp_max: 0, temp_min: 0, humidity: 0, }, wind: { speed: 0, deg: 0 }, weather: { description: "Weather description" }, }; export default function WeatherApp() { const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const [weatherData, setWeatherData] = useState(initialWeatherData); const searchPressed = () => { fetch(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${search}&appid=0a789d0c294e3cc30c1f44cb4298bb15`) .then(response => { if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Network response was not ok'); } return response.json(); }) .then((result) => { setWeatherData(result); console.log(result); }) } return (
Check the weather forecast setSearch(e.target.value)} style={{ border: "1px solid #ccc", backgroundColor: "#f8f9fa", color: "#333", padding: "8px 12px", borderRadius: "5px", }} /> Search
{weatherData.name}

Current temperature: {weatherData.main.temp}

Feels like: {weatherData.main.feels_like}

Max: {weatherData.main.temp_max}, Min: {weatherData.temp_min}

Humidity: {weatherData.main.humidity}

Wind Speed: {weatherData.wind.speed}

Direction: {weatherData.wind.deg}Â°

Scattered Clouds
); }
